item.title: JavaScript Fundamentals
item.description: I’ve come up with the idea of starting a series of articles on programming, specifically aimed at addressing the questions I encountered as a beginner on my JavaScript journey. This includes things that might seem evident or trivial, but are not so obvious for a beginner. Sometimes, knowing how to use things is sufficient, but there are people who feel frustrated when they don’t fully understand how these things work.
